definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

sentences.english: Except for the weapons and Japanese trucks, it could be 600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 除了武器与日本卡车，它就跟600年前没什么两样。

sentences.english: These are complementary concerns and presuppose each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两样是互补的，单独都无法成立。

sentences.english: I thought it was probably neither.
sentences.chinese: 我想，它或许两样都不沾。

sentences.english: The house was just as I left it except that everything was covered with dust.
sentences.chinese: 除了积满灰尘之外，这房子与我离开时没什么两样。

sentences.english: Does a spring send forth fresh water and bitter from the same opening?
sentences.chinese: 泉源从一个眼里能发出甜苦两样的水么？

sentences.english: The crossHatch shader actually does two separate things.
sentences.chinese: 交叉阴影着色网络实际上做了两样事。

sentences.english: Two different scenarios. Bothe started the same, Both ended different.
sentences.chinese: 由同一个开端所引起的两个情境，但结局完全两样。

sentences.english: So people use them to  symbolize longevity.
sentences.chinese: 所以人们就拿这两样东西来象征长寿。

sentences.english: Without ideal, with salted fish have what different.
sentences.chinese: 没有理想，跟咸鱼有什么两样。

sentences.english: Brigands demand money or your life, whereas women require both. ─Samuel Butler.
sentences.chinese: 强盗要不到钱就要你命，女人呢两样都要。

sentences.english: It is nothing but earth， like all the other earth.
sentences.chinese: 那里只有泥土，和其他地方的泥土没什么两样。

sentences.english: A lazy man's life is dull and spiritless . While in life he is lifeless.
sentences.chinese: 懒惰的人一生沉闷，毫无生气，生和死没什么两样。

sentences.english: Buying stuff and cooking food are two of the most common unplanned consumptions of time.
sentences.chinese: 买东西和做饭是两样最常见的并无需计划的时间消费。

sentences.english: Ugh! I already smell it. Two things go in.
sentences.chinese: 额，我已经闻到了，两样东西加进去。

sentences.english: Just need to knoe how many and cost price for a bag of rice.
sentences.chinese: 只需要一袋大米多少和成本的价格没什么两样。

sentences.english: Divers weights, [and] divers measures, both of them [are] alike abomination to the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 两样的法码，两样的升斗，都为耶和华所憎恶。

definition: erhua variant of 玩意[wan2 yi4]
toy/plaything/thing/act/trick (in a performance, stage show, acrobatics etc)
difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
see 沒關係|没关系[mei2 guan1 xi5]
